description: CircuitMaker is no longer developed and has been replaced by Altium Designer, a electronic product design program. Altium Designer provides a unified product development interface and can be used for a more broad range of hardware design that CircuitMaker.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ckt file in Kubotek KeyCreator Pro 2021
images.caption: CKT file open in Kubotek KeyCreator Pro 2021
